bibl.title: Special Orders No. 124 from Peyton C. March, May 27, 1918

div1.p: Moran is ordered to report to New York City.

div1.head: Special Orders No. 124 from Peyton C. March, May 27, 1918
div1.p:
124. The appointment of John J. Moran as captain, Quar-
termaster Corps, National Army, with rank from May 27,
1918, is announced. He will report in person without delay
to the depot quartermaster, New York, N. Y., for assignment
to duty as his assistant.
div1.closer:
BY ORDER OF THE SECRETARY OF WAR: PEYTON C. MARCH.
General, Chief of Staff. OFFICIAL:
H. P. McCAIN,
The Adjutant General.
